query:
INSERT INTO onboarding_config (stepKey, stepTitle, stepDescription, actionType, actionConfig, sortOrder) VALUES
('welcome_email', 'Welcome Email', 'Send a personalized welcome email to the new user', 'email', '{"subject":"Welcome to RusingÂcademy!","template":"welcome"}', 1),
('admin_notification', 'Admin Notification', 'Notify admin of new user registration', 'notification', '{"message":"New student enrolled: {{name}}","recipients":"admin"}', 2),
('assign_starter_course', 'Assign Free Starter Course', 'Auto-enroll the user in the free introductory course', 'course_assign', '{"courseType":"starter","autoEnroll":true}', 3),
('getting_started_email', 'Getting Started Guide', 'Send a guide email with first steps', 'email', '{"subject":"Your learning journey starts here","template":"getting_started"}', 4),
('onboarding_checklist', 'Onboarding Checklist', 'Show interactive checklist widget for new users', 'checklist', '{"items":["Complete your profile","Take the placement test","Start your first lesson","Join the community"]}', 5)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stepTitle = VALUES(stepTitle);
